Name of Agency to Which this Form Applie: Office of Inspector General (OIG), Department of the Treasury
Additional Scope Comments: GRS ITEMS PROPOSED FOR USE: All email, other than item 010, will be managed under item 011. IMPLEMENTATION SCOPE: Office of Inspector General (OIG) is a component of record group 056 (Treasury Departmental Offices) but is independently implementing the Capstone approach with respect to its (component-level) email system. The scope of this form is limited to account holders in the OIG email system. Both OIG and Treasury Departmental Offices are submitting separate NA Forms 1005 with respect to their respective email account holders.
Cutoff Instructions: Email in item 010 will be cut off at the end of the calendar year (December 31) in which the tenure of the Capstone official ends.
Transfer Instructions: Email of Capstone officials (item 010) will be transferred to NARA 15 years after cutoff.
Legacy Email Scope: OIG will include legacy email for all items being used, dating back to approximately 2002 for Capstone officials, and for non-Capstone officials dating back approximately 7 years from the effective date of this schedule.

Name of Agency to Which this Form Applie: The Department of Army:  U.S. Army Special Operations Command
Additional Scope Comments: Army Corps of Engineers, RG 77, Office of the Surgeon General RG 112, Army Staff RG 319,  Army Secretariat RG 335,  Army Space & Missile Defense Command RG 338,  Army Surface Deployment & Distribution Command RG 338, US Army South RG 338, US Army North/5th Army RG 338, US Army Central RG 338,  US Army Africa RG 338, Army Materiel Command RG 544, US Army Europe RG 549, US Army Pacific RG 550, Army Forces Command RG 555.Other emails will be managed using standard Records Management practices based on content of the email. Legacy Email Scope: Agency will be including legacy email dating back to 2013, as the email journaling policy defined in the Army Regulation 25-400-2 Army Records Information Management System was in place prior to Capstone.

Additional Scope Comments: GRS ITEMS PROPOSED FOR USE: All email, other than item 010, will be managed under item 011. RELATED NA FORMS 1005: The scope of this form will be limited to the account holders in the TIGTA email system. Please note that TIGTA is a component of records group 056 (Treasury Departmental Offices) but is independently implementing the Capstone approach with respect to its (component-level) email system. Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff of email will be annual (December 31).
Legacy Email Scope: No legacy email exists for this agency, as traditional records management with a print-and-file policy was enforced prior to Capstone adoption.
